Package de.bacherik.pluginapi.builder

Class BossBarBuilder

java.lang.Object
de.bacherik.pluginapi.builder.BossBarBuilder
public class BossBarBuilder extends Object
This class is used to make create Boss bar's easier.
Author:
Let's play Nik

    • setTitle

      public BossBarBuilder setTitle(String title)

      Parameters:

    • setProgress

      public BossBarBuilder setProgress(double min, double max, double value)
      This is used when a number between 1 and 100 has not yet been generated to indicate the progress around the boss bar.
      Parameters:
      min - the minimum number of the Boss bar (0%)
      max - the maximum number of the Boss bar (100%)
      value - the actual number between min and max

    • setProgress

      public BossBarBuilder setProgress(double progress)
      The simpler version of the other setProgress.
      Parameters:
      progress - the value between 0 and 100

      Parameters:
      barColor - the color af the Boss bar

    • setStyle

      public BossBarBuilder setStyle(org.bukkit.boss.BarStyle barStyle)
      This is the style used for the Boss bar, for example how many segments there are.
      Parameters:
      barStyle - enum of BarStyle

    • addFlag

      public BossBarBuilder addFlag(org.bukkit.boss.BarFlag barFlag)
      I don`t know I have never used it, but it comes from the BarFlag enum which is also used, but I don`t know what effect it has.
      Parameters:

    • add

      public BossBarBuilder add(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Adds a player to a list of which players see the boss bar.
      Parameters:
      player - The player who should see the boss bar.

    • remove

      public BossBarBuilder remove(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Removes a player to a list of which players see the boss bar.
      Parameters:
      player - The player who shouldn't see the boss bar.
